评论概述: First Amazon dress to fit me correctly
评论详情: I just bought another dress from this company because I liked this dress so much. I looked up this company and bought another dress.  It's super comfortable, not sheer, made well, flattering.  This dress and the other are the first dresses I've bought from Amazon that I've kept!  I've bought several over the years and they never fit.  FINALLY I've found a company that fits me.  Interesting though, I bought this is red, which is really an orange red, and it didn't really fit the same or feel as comfortable.  Don't be fooled. These are small sizes for US sizing. I wear an 8-10, 5"10, 150 lbs.  Large is almost too small.  Hopefully these don't shrink!

评论概述: Dress for cool weather and colors
评论详情: This dress fit just right. I love the length. You can wear "knee" boots or ankle boots and you can even wear sandals if you wear this dress during a cool spring day. Purchased the "black/yellow" version of this dress in a XL (16-18) after reading reviews. I am a 12-14.  Was concerned the hip section might be too small so I sized up.  Boy was I wrong.  The waist/hip and length were all perfect.  However, the bust was way off - too small.  I was not able to button the top portion of the dress.  Returning.  I should learn my lesson regarding the "vendors" for Amazon and their sizing charts.  I have purchased far too many clothing items here that are completely incorrect from the sizing charts.  It is back to name brand retailers with USA labels for me.

I only like to wear Rayon or Cotton Material.  A lot of these natural materials will wrinkle very easily.  This dress shrunk a small bit but I did put in dryer.  It came out non wrinkled.  The colors are just as pictured and the print is sharp and bold.  I love how this dress feels and fits.  I ordered a Medium.  I am 5'6" 145lb 38DD and this dress so far fit me very well.  I do hope it will not continue to shrink when washed as I have found that to happen with 100% Rayon products.  It would be best to not put in dryer to keep from shrinking but then you will need to Iron it I'm guessing.  Overall, I am happy with this dress for the way it fits and feels.  I also love the long sleeves as they can be slipped up easily and even look as if I have shorter sleeves.

This dress is pretty, lightweight, perfect for summer and fall, comes in many beautiful colors and is comfortable. The issue is it will have an unpleasant perfume odor, sometimes ridiculously strong on dresses from Amazon vendors.  I have read this is done to cover chemical fungicide odor, for example. If you plan to keep, give these dresses a good pre-soak in a pale with organic laundry soap and then wash them gentle cycle, cold water, again preferably with an organic laundry soap and you will probably still need a little white vinegar for the rinse cycle.  That's how bad it can be.  Hang dry (because they are a bit delicate), no dryer and no dryer sheet.  In my experience this DOES work and you can enjoy the dress.
